name: neeq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2012.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Nov-2019.)
